info.description: This is the backend for Stitchfolio.
info.title: Stitchfolio-backend API docs

post.description: Switch a record from one channel to another
post.summary: Switch a record from one channel to another

get.description: Returns order dashboard: by status, overdue/at-risk, revenue, deliveries due, recent deliveries, by taken-by, count in period, recent activity.
Returns stats dashboard: revenue, pipeline value, enquiries by status/source, conversion, expenses, new customers, task completion, low stock, top referrers.
Returns task dashboard: overdue, due today/next 7 days, by assignee, high priority, reminders, completion rate, recent completions.
Get enquiry histories by enquiry id
get.summary: Get enquiry histories by enquiry id

put.description: Updates both enquiry and customer data together

get.description: Get all inventory logs filtered by change type (IN, OUT, ADJUST)
get.summary: Get inventory logs by change type

get.description: Get all inventory logs within a date range
get.summary: Get inventory logs by date range

get.description: Get all inventory logs for a specific product
get.summary: Get inventory logs by product ID

get.description: Get an instance of Inventory Log
Get all items with stock below threshold

post.description: Record a stock IN, OUT, or ADJUST movement

get.description: Get inventory for a specific product

put.description: Update the low stock threshold for a product

get.description: Get a specific master config by name

post.description: Get multiple master config values by their names (format: "Type.Name")

get.description: Get a specific master config by ID
Get all active measurements grouped by PersonId with DressTypes as CSV. Searches by Customer Name.
get.summary: Get all active measurements grouped by PersonId

parameters.description: search by Customer Name (returns all Persons of that customer)
parameters.name: search

get.description: Get measurement histories by measurement id
get.summary: Get measurement histories by measurement id

put.description: Updates an array of measurements by their IDs

post.description: Saves multiple measurements for multiple persons in bulk

put.description: Updates a single measurement by its ID

get.description: Get order histories by order id
get.summary: Get order histories by order id

get.description: Get all active products with current stock
Autocomplete for products with stock info
Get all products with stock below threshold
Get an instance of Product with inventory

post.description: Saves an instance of User Channel Detail

get.description: Gets the channel the user can access, to be used for channel switcher
get.summary: Gets the channel the user can access

put.description: Update an instance of User Channel Detail

delete.description: Deletes an instance of User Channel Detail

post.description: Saves an instance of User Config

put.description: Update an instance of User Config

get.description: Refresh JWT Token and switches the user to the requested channel
get.summary: Refresh JWT Token and Switches the Channel

channelId.description:
Channel Id must be create only since it will interfere with update operations
Use tx.Exec as raw query to update the channelId as done in channel after-create hook

createdBy.description: Transient fields for response mapping, not stored in DB

x-enum-comments.ADMIN: to be used by the application administrator
x-enum-comments.DEV: to be used by developer, only read access in PROD
x-enum-comments.SUPERADMIN: to be used for the owner of the application (customer)
x-enum-comments.SYSTEM_ADMIN: to be used for managing system only,not exposed

x-enum-comments.INVALID: Invalid operation for this type of item.
x-enum-comments.IO: External I/O error such as network failure.
x-enum-comments.OTHER: Unclassified error. This value is not printed in the error message.

adminOverride.description: Allow OUT even if stock insufficient

productCount.description: Count of products in this category

Channel Id must be create only since it will interfere with update operations
Use tx.Exec as raw query to update the channelId as done in channel after-create hook

createdBy.description: Transient fields for response mapping, not stored in DB

orderQuantity.description: sum of quantity from order items

orderValue.description: sum of total from order items

ordersByStatus.description: count per status DRAFT  DELIVERED, CANCELLED

overdueAtRiskOrders.description: ExpectedDeliveryDate passed or soon, not DELIVERED

enquiryOrderConversion.description: orders linked to customers who had enquiries in period

orderPipelineValue.description: sum value for orders not CANCELLED/DELIVERED
